text: allahuvinre atutt siparsayeattum upakarikkukayilla; avan anumati nalkiyavarkkallate. annane avarute hrdayannalilninn paribhramam ninniyillatakumpeal avar siparsakareatu ceadikkunnu: "ninnalute nathan entan parannat?" avar marupati parayum: "satyam tanne. avan atyunnatanan. ella nilakkum valiyavanum
